name: Plum Tomatoes
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - vegetables category
Lower seed content than regular tomatoes
benefits: Plum tomatoes (also called Roma tomatoes) contain approximately 94% water, making them highly effective for weight loss through calorie dilution. They're particularly rich in lycopene, a powerful antioxidant with anti-inflammatory properties. Their meatier texture compared to regular tomatoes makes them ideal for chopping in salads.
amount: 2 ripe plum tomatoes, chopped, for tabbouleh serving 4
